articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Tesla workers shared ‘intimate’ car camera images, ex-employees allege: ‘Massive invasion of privacy’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Cameras affixed on cars sent videos of customers and their property to the EV maker’s offices and spread ‘like wildfire’
articles.content: Tesla assures its millions of electric car owners that their privacy is and will always be enormously important to us. The cameras it builds into vehicles to assist driving, it notes on its website, … [+16067 chars]

articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war: Rouble tumbles to lowest in a year - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Rouble falls to lowest against dollar and euro since April last year in the face of a foreign currency crunch in Moscow.
articles.content: The Russian rouble has suffered its biggest intraday fall of the year as it tumbled to the lowest levels against the dollar and euro since April last year in the face of a foreign currency crunch in … [+1668 chars]
